Package model

Class Player

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.util.Observable
      • model.Player

  • public class Player
extends java.util.Observable
    models one player that is playing on a GameMap. Contains info such as player gold, currency, score, health, towers, etc. Observed by the GameView

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor Description
      Player​(GameMap map)
      constructs our player object based on a GameMap
